solution_line_template: Rene finished {rene_pages_per_60} x {num_blocks} = <<{rene_pages_per_60}*{num_blocks}={rene_pages}>>{rene_pages} pages in {total_minutes} minutes.
Lulu finished {lulu_pages_per_60} x {num_blocks} = <<{lulu_pages_per_60}*{num_blocks}={lulu_pages}>>{lulu_pages} pages in {total_minutes} minutes.
Cherry finished {cherry_pages_per_60} x {num_blocks} = <<{cherry_pages_per_60}*{num_blocks}={cherry_pages}>>{cherry_pages} pages in {total_minutes} minutes.
Therefore they have finished a total of {rene_pages} + {lulu_pages} + {cherry_pages} = {total_pages} pages in {total_minutes} minutes.
